citeinfo.origin: GIS Program/Bernalillo County Public Works Division
citeinfo.title: coasde.OPENSPACE.opensp

descript.abstract: This data set is a complete inventory of Open Space properties - excluding administrative properties - managed by the City of Albuquerque Open Space Division in Bernalillo County, NM. This includes properties that are not currently open to the public.
descript.purpose: This data set is maintained by the Open Space Division of the City of Albuquerque Parks and Recreation Department.

idinfo.useconst: Please acknowledge the GIS Program/Bernalillo County Public Works Division and the City of Albuquerque Open Space Division when using this data set as a source. The City of Albuquerque Open Space Division requests that properties with a Status of "Trust Land" are not displayed on maps.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.0.1770

citeinfo.origin: Bernalillo County Assessor's Office GIS/Mapping Department
citeinfo.title: Assessor Parcel Database 2012

srcinfo.srccontr:
Some of the property locations were first identified using the "OWNER" attribute from this source.
The "Owner" attribute is populated using the "OWNER" attribute from this source.
The polygon boundaries follow features in this source where possible.

citeinfo.title: Albuquerque Open Space Program Web Site

srcinfo.srccontr: Some properties were created using the descriptions and maps from this source.

citeinfo.origin: National Park Service (NPS)/U.S. Department of the Interior (USDOI)
citeinfo.title: Petroglyph National Monument Web Page

srcinfo.srccontr: This source was used to define the boundaries for the open space properties within the Petroglyph National Monument.

citeinfo.origin: City of Albuquerque Open Space Division
citeinfo.title: City Open Space Shapefiles
citeinfo.othercit: Shapefiles provided by Erik Zsemlye, City of Albuquerque Open Space Division.

srcinfo.srccontr: Boundaries for some properties were provided by this source.

citeinfo.title: Orthoimagery Mosaic 2010-Bernalillo County
citeinfo.othercit: Bohannan Huston, Inc. was contracted by the Mid-Region Council of Governments (MRCOG) for this project.

srcinfo.srccontr: Some polygons were screen-digitized to this source.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

enttyp.enttypds: GIS Program/Bernalillo County Public Works Division-GIS/BCPWD

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Acreage calculated from polygon geometry using ArcGIS software. This is not a legal acreage.

distinfo.distliab: This information is for reference only. Bernalillo County assumes no liability for errors associated with the use of these data. Users are solely responsible for confirming data accuracy when necessary.
distinfo.techpreq: Users will need ArcGIS software (ArcMap, ArcCatalog, ArcToolbox) to interact with the data.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.2.2.3552
dataIdInfo.idPurp: This data set is maintained by the Open Space Division of the City of Albuquerque Parks and Recreation Department.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: This data set is a complete inventory of Open Space properties - excluding administrative properties - managed by the City of Albuquerque Open Space Division in Bernalillo County, NM. This includes properties that are not currently open to the public.

Consts.useLimit: Please acknowledge the City of Albuquerque Open Space Division when using this data set as a source. The City of Albuquerque Open Space Division requests that properties with a Status of "Closed" are not displayed on publicly-available maps.
